description.value: When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Command an Animal] you're mounted on to take a move action (such as Stride), you automatically succeed instead of needing to attempt a check. Any animal you're mounted on acts on your turn, like a minion. If you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Mount] an animal in the middle of an encounter, it skips its next turn and then acts on your next turn.
